title: Sofa

claims.preamble: I claim the ornamental design for a sofa, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a front elevation view of the sofa showing my design.
FIG. 2 is top plan view thereof;
FIG. 3 is a back perspective view thereof; and,
FIG. 4 is a side view thereof, an opposite side view being a mirror image thereof.
The broken lines shown on the sofa are understood to represent stitching.
